dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMonth DD, YYYY') booking_date, srem1.remark_text credit_number, TRIM(TO_CHAR( (SELECT COUNT(sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd JOIN s_ship_unit sunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = sunit.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT sunit.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1), '999,999,999')) || ' X ' || (CASE WHEN (SELECT ssu.received_ship_unit_count FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) = 42 THEN '40 FT HC CONTAINERS' ELSE TRIM(TO_CHAR( (SELECT ssu.received_ship_unit_count FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) ,'999,999')) || ' FT CONTAINERS' END) quantity, TRIM(cv.voyage_name || ' ' || cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value) vessel, (SELECT sr.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sr WHERE sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' AND sr.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) bl_num FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON srn.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem1 ON s.shipment_gid = srem1.shipment_gid AND srem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LETTER OF CREDIT NUM' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT oob.order_base_xid order_id, COALESCE(obr1.remark_text, itm.description) description FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr1.order_base_gid AND obr1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_COMMODITY DETAIL' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_line oline ON oob.order_base_gid = oline.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN item itm ON oline.packaged_item_gid = itm.item_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID UNION ALL SELECT '' order_id, '' description FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT s.shipment_gid FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID)

SELECT ssu.tag_3 container_number, (CASE WHEN ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'MTON' OR ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'MT' THEN ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight,3) WHEN ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'LB' THEN ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight * 0.0004536,3) WHEN ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'KG' THEN ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight / 1000,3) ELSE ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight,3) END) net_wt, (CASE WHEN ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'MTON' OR ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'MT' THEN ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight,3) WHEN ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'LB' THEN ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight * 0.0004536,3) WHEN ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'KG' THEN ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight / 1000,3) ELSE ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight,3) END) + (CASE WHEN sref2.refnum_value = 'MTON' OR sref2.refnum_value = 'MT' THEN ROUND(TO_NUMBER(sref1.refnum_value),3) WHEN sref2.refnum_value = 'LB' THEN ROUND(TO_NUMBER(sref1.refnum_value) * 0.0004536,3) WHEN sref2.refnum_value = 'KG' THEN ROUND(TO_NUMBER(sref1.refnum_value) / 1000,3) ELSE 0 END) gross_wt, sref3.refnum_value bags FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum sref1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sref1.s_ship_unit_gid AND sref1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER TARE WEIGHT' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum sref2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sref2.s_ship_unit_gid AND sref2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER TARE WEIGHT UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum sref3 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sref3.s_ship_unit_gid AND sref3.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID ORDER BY container_number

SELECT (CASE WHEN ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'MTON' OR ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'MT' THEN SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight,3)) WHEN ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'LB' THEN SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight * 0.0004536,3)) WHEN ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'KG' THEN SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight / 1000,3)) ELSE SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight,3)) END) total_net_wt, (CASE WHEN ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'MTON' OR ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'MT' THEN SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight,3)) WHEN ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'LB' THEN SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight * 0.0004536,3)) WHEN ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code = 'KG' THEN SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight / 1000,3)) ELSE SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight,3)) END) + (CASE WHEN sref2.refnum_value = 'MTON' OR sref2.refnum_value = 'MT' THEN SUM(ROUND(TO_NUMBER(sref1.refnum_value),3)) WHEN sref2.refnum_value = 'LB' THEN SUM(ROUND(TO_NUMBER(sref1.refnum_value) * 0.0004536,3)) WHEN sref2.refnum_value = 'KG' THEN SUM(ROUND(TO_NUMBER(sref1.refnum_value) / 1000,3)) ELSE 0 END) total_gross_wt, SUM(TO_NUMBER(sref3.refnum_value)) total_bags FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum sref1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sref1.s_ship_unit_gid AND sref1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER TARE WEIGHT' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum sref2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sref2.s_ship_unit_gid AND sref2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER TARE WEIGHT UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum sref3 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sref3.s_ship_unit_gid AND sref3.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID GROUP BY ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code, sref2.refnum_value
